My job included prospecting and making cold calls to different companies in Helsinki metropolitan area. I also had the possibility to attend for sales meetings to watch and learn about business-to-business sales.

Sales Representative

Elisa

Sep 2014 - Jun 2017

Helsinki Area, Finland

B2C job during my Bachelor's Degree studies. The job provided me the perfect opportunity to learn about persistence in sales. In Elisa I was responsible for the complete selling process from the beginning to the end. I was contacting customers who passed by in shopping malls. I asked them questions to find out their needs regarding their mobile connections and internet services. I would then present my solution which usually solved their problems. After that I closed the deal and made sure that the customer got our product and was happy about it.

I was working in Elisa for almost 3 years as a part time employee and I achieved my personal selling goals almost every month. I consider that the achieved success was a combination of hard-work and commitment to the job.

Team Leader

HelsinkiMissio ry.

Mar 2013 - Jul 2014

Helsinki Area, Finland

This job was really valuable to me because I was gathering funding to help people with disabilities, depressed youngsters and elderly who suffer from loneliness. The job started as a summer job. My mission was to collect monthly donors. Over the months I developed to be such good at it that I got promoted to a team leader.

As Team Leader my task was get my team to achieve great results. I motivated and coached my team members to achieve results. There were 20 people working in my team.
